title: The PVK Bump
description:
I've caught the attention of the Amateur Light Web's Posterboy Pastor, caught salting his Estuary Waters. Here are some clipzophrenic thoughts on the matter.

Weyland - /watch?v=E4SSU29Arj0
Sivers - /watch?v=fW8amMCVAJQ
Turbo Weapons - /watch?v=rWAEq7TInO0
PVK/Griz #1 - /watch?v=uhn2ibaMTMI
Serenity - /watch?v=ZU26EseuDoI
Cookie Auction - /watch?v=eVc38G5mB-0
Small Moves - /watch?v=oB6NNbFHjCc

Here's a Discord for people who don't hate me:
https://discord.gg/W8tnFw5t9p

Here's a Patreon for people who want to encourage me:
https://www.patreon.com/grimgriz

https://grimgriz.substack.com/
